title: Blood Moon Thresh
body: Okay...so ive been waiting for the Blood Moon Thresh, but its not out, i have looked at                                                                                                                          http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Lunar_Revel ............... and it seems like its gonna come out next early next year during the Lunar Revel Festival event. Anyone have any idea on when its actual release date is? Comments would be nice, I Want this Thresh Skin badly. Cant Afford to wait till next year, thanks!

replies.body: It's coming out in patch 4.21, that's confirmed. There is yet no way to know when in patch 4.21 it's coming out though.
Well......4.21 wont last till next year? who knows? but i think 4.22 is next years one..
If it does last until next year, which I doubt it will, it will be at most a few days before 4.22 kick in.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ikRTgBom,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2014-12-17T09:27:17.818+0000)
>
> If it does last until next year, which I doubt it will, it will be at most a few days before 4.22 kick in.

Yeah i agree, hope its anytime soon

PBE already talking about 5.1 patch, so who knows, 4.21 might last a while since it might be the last "season 4" patch.

For example, season 3 ended with patch 3.15 which was released 13/12, the next patch (4.1) wasn't released until 15/1

Also Snowdown doesnt finish until 6/1 and I doubt these skins will be released during the Xmas event

Skins have already been earmarked for the "lunar revel" which is an event on January 10th.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ikRTgBom,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-18T05:45:05.794+0000)
>
> PBE already talking about 5.1 patch, so who knows, 4.21 might last a while since it might be the last "season 4" patch.
> 
> For example, season 3 ended with patch 3.15 which was released 13/12, the next patch (4.1) wasn't released until 15/1
> 
> Also Snowdown doesnt finish until 6/1 and I doubt these skins will be released during the Xmas event
> 
> Skins have already been earmarked for the "lunar revel" which is an event on January 10th.

I Guess Were gonna have to wait 2 weeks more.........
next year is literally 2 weeks away...
Yeah, exactly......cant wait that long, we dont have an accurate date at the moment, so we'll have to wait for further news from rito
